name: Baldi Loves Grades (Remastered)
description:
This is a remastered version of baldi loves grades.

This is a mod where baldi loves grades and he will use his obsession with grades to come after you. You have to answer all 7 schoolworks, collect them at the end, and exit the school to win.

Credits:

Michaeldoesgaming for the baldi is stuck remastered inspiration.

SplintaDinta for the baldi model.

SuperInky for the badsum model.

Uberduck for the baldi and principal texts to speech.

Rinolt_2 for the school sign.

SadColoredMods for the sky mask.

Punkred for the YCTP pad model on the title screen.
